title: Control Field
paragraph: Control fields have two main purposes. Firstly, they are the only field where one can recruit special units. Secondly, control fields give you buffs for any fight on the Crater of Immortality.

chapters.subtitle: Recruiting Special Units
chapters.paragraph: In every control field, you are able to recruit the a special unit according to the path you have chosen during your progression within the runes (global skill tree).

chapters.subtitle: Combat Buffs on the COI
chapters.paragraph:
For every fight happening on the Crater of Immortality (COI), a team will receive buffs according to the total number of control fields the team currently owns. 

 If you attack the Crater of Immortality, you will receive a 10% Attack-Buff for every Control Field your team owns at this point of time. 

 If you defend the Crater of Immortality, you will receive a 20% Defense-Buff for every Control Field your team owns at this point of time.

chapters.subtitle: What can I do on this field?
chapters.paragraph:
• Unit Recruiting: Yes (special units only)
  • Soul Stone Production: Yes
  • Local Skill Tree: No
